# **Welcome!**

I'm Gabrielle, and I am a recent graduate of the University of California, Santa Barbara with a Master's in Environmental Data Science. I'm passionate about leveraging remote sensing techniques to address our environmental challenges. If you're curious about some of the projects I've worked on, you came to the right place!
